expo.name: medmonitor-mobile
expo.description: Application used to keep track of patient health and parkinson symptoms.

infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to access your calendar
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to use your camera
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to access your contacts
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to use your location
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to access your microphone
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to access your device's accelerometer
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Give Expo experiences permission to save photos
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Give Expo experiences permission to access your photos
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Allow Expo experiences to access your reminders
